title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.7 - Lap seam crack
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-10.7 - Lap seam crack

State Regulations

The shell or drum of a boiler in which a typical "lap
seam crack" is discovered along a longitudinal riveted joint for either butt
seam or lap joints shall be permanently discontinued for use under steam
pressure. By "lap seam crack" is meant the typical crack frequently found in
lap seams extending parallel to the longitudinal joint and located either
between or adjacent to rivet holes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-10.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
